attributes.action: Introduce legislation to strip Baroness Michelle Mone of her peerage.
attributes.additional_details:
PPEMedpro has been ordered to repay £122m to the taxpayer for faulty PPE. Mone lied about being linked to the firm, which has now gone into administration meaning the taxpayer is unlikely to recover any money.

She is on a leave of absence from the House of Lords & the National Crime Agency is investigating. 

She should play no role in public life.
attributes.background: The government should introduce legislation to strip Baroness Michelle Mone of the peerage awarded by David Cameron in 2015.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away. We also can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given a job, or to lose their job.
